name: Crazy-Runner-3D
description:
Play Crazy Runner 3D! A graphically rich, fun Running game where you have to compete against other athletic Blobs. Each Blob is fierce and trained to win, so be sure to run through the right door or get stuck and left behind.

So what are you waiting for?
Get your running shoes on and race to the finish line!

Features:
- Higher difficulty levels
- Strategy based
- Unlimited levels
- Sharp graphics
- Super fun gameplay
- Smooth controls
